events.name: onPress
events.description: Handler called when the press is released over the target.
events.description_zh: 当压力机释放到目标上方时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressStart
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction starts.
events.description_zh: 在新闻交互开始时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressEnd
events.description: Handler called when a press interaction ends, either over the target or when the pointer leaves the target.
events.description_zh: 当按下交互结束时（在目标上方或指针离开目标时）调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressChange
events.description: Handler called when the press state changes.
events.description_zh: 当按下状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onPressUp
events.description: Handler called when a press is released over the target, regardless of whether it started on the target or not.
events.description_zh: 当按下在目标上释放时调用的处理程序，无论它是否在目标上启动。

events.name: onKeyDown
events.description: Handler called when a key is pressed.
events.description_zh: 按下某个键时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onKeyUp
events.description: Handler called when a key is released.
events.description_zh: 释放密钥时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onClick
events.description: The native button click event handler (**Deprecated**) use **onPress** instead.
events.description_zh: 本机按钮单击事件处理程序 （**已弃用**） 改用 **onPress**。

:children.description: The content to display in the button.
:children.description_zh: 要在按钮中显示的内容。

variant.type: solid / bordered / light / flat / faded / shadow / ghost

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

fullWidth.description: Whether the button should take the full width of its parent.
fullWidth.description_zh: 按钮是否应采用其父按钮的整个宽度。

isIconOnly.description: Whether the button should have the same width and height.
isIconOnly.description_zh: 按钮是否应具有相同的宽度和高度。

disableRipple.description: Whether the button should display a ripple effect on press.
disableRipple.description_zh: 按钮是否应在按下时显示涟漪效果。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the button should display animations.
